item.description:
Please join the bike tour I will be leading as part of the International Festival of Arts & Ideas (organized by Elm City Cycling). The tour will visit several *Community Gardens and Greenspaces* in the Westville area. PLUS community cookout at Williams Street Community Garden afterward.

Meet at 9:00 am on the corner of Church and Elm (at the festival booth).
Get ready to visit:
The Kids Rainbow Garden (Greenspace)
Chapelseed (Community Garden) – Introduction and brief talk by Rachel Ziesk
East Edge Gardens (Greenspace)
Springside Liberty (Community Garden) – Introduction by Tom Bell
Beaver Ponds Park (Greenspace)

The ride will end at Elm and Church but you have the option of riding with me to a community cookout at Williams Street Community Garden.

HELMETS ARE MANDATORY

*The gardens and green spaces are made possible by a partnership between the Maintenance Division of the Department of Parks, Recreation and Trees, the Community Foundation for Greater New Haven, Urban Resources Initiative (URI – an initiative of the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies) and the New Haven Land Trust.
item.name: Bike Tour of Gardens and Greenspaces & Cookout
